item.title: 10 Hulk Movie & Show Scenes That Have Gotten Better With Age
item.description: Hulk once dominated Marvel movie history, with a legacy spanning decades, with some of his most iconic scenes only improving in hindsight.

item.title: Karate Kid: Legends' Johnny Lawrence Replacement Can Fix A 39-Year-Old Franchise Mistake
item.description: The Karate Kid made a major mistake with Johnny Lawrence's character 39 years ago, but Karate Kid: Legends finally has the opportunity to fix it.

item.title: "It Was Just Dead in The Water": How Ben Affleck's 85% RT Sports Drama Flopping At The Box Office Changed The Accountant 2 Explained By Director
item.description: The Accountant 2 director Gavin O'Connor explains how the sequel was affected by Ben Affleck's 85% RT sports drama flopping at the box office.
